‘wakugadu satana’, eka husmata kiyawa gena ya haki tharam agana sarala shailiyakin liyawi athi, patakayage manasa buddhiyen pubuduwana danum sambharayakin hebi ga්ranthayaki.
ohu antharjala waranaya pilibanda wa pasugiya sathi kipayak thula hatagath sanwadayata kala madihath wima itha wichithra yi, widagdha yi, thiyunu yi.
ohu mehi pitapatha kiyawala jiwithaye gambaura dakina aakaraya hari apuruwata loku mahansiyak aragena nirmanaya karala thiyenawa.

ohuge anu wani upan dinaya yedi aththe nowambar 3 wani dinayatayi.ape jyeshta gayana shilpiyage janma dinaya thawath suwisheshi wanne parampara hatharaka ekathuwen ‘siripade’ namin pawathwana sangitha prasangaya nisayi.winsant da pol piris, ohuge du daruwan, munuburu minibiriyan, munuburu minibiriyange da daruwan (mi munuburu minibiriyan) ekkara gena pawathwana thunwani ‘siripade’ prasangaya meyayi. 2008 di punchi thiyatar hi prasangaya pawathwunu dina namel - malini wiramuni kala yuwala sema, kalo fonseka mahacharyawarayath pawasuwe me ginas pothata yana warthawak kiyayi.
